DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of Choline alfoscerate and Donepezil for cognitive improvements of patients with cerebrovascular injury in Alzheimer patients
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial for an Evaluation of Choline Alfoscerate and Donepezil for Cognitive Improvements of Patients With Cerebrovascular Injury in Alzheimer Patients
DOC.criteria: 1. 56~90 male and female 2. MiniMental State Evaluation (MMSE) between 24 and 12 3. A subject who provided written informed consent to participate in this study and cooperative with regard to compliance with study related constraints 1.
